data.text: @m3i7i Hi there,  you can find out more information on how to cancel your flight at our Travel Alerts page here: https://t.co/anhzfOIxHb.  There are a number of options available to you depending upon your circumstances. thanks Leesa

@Yellowfin8388 Hi. We are offering the option to cancel your flight and receive a credit voucher for the full value of your booking. The fastest and easiest way to request a voucher is by visiting Manage My Booking. Please DM if you need further instructions. Regards, Steph
@vlavalent Hey! Can you send us a DM with your booking reference details and your full name and we'll see how we can sort this out for you! Cheers, Stephan
@mat_herbert Hi Matt, we'd like to assist with your booking. Please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Joie
@Juliana28203123 Hi Juliana, Thanks for contacting us. Please send us a DM with your Booking reference and full name so that we can look into how we can assist you. Thanks-Jo
@TinaKhannn HI Tina, I appreciate that this must be stressful for you. If you'd like us to look into your options, please DM us with your booking reference. Thanks-Jo
@loveruiz_07 Thanks for bringing this to our attention, I have raised this to be reviewed by the team. SK
@_xCeleste Hi  - thanks for reaching out. If the passenger could please reach out to us, we can look in to their experience to understand events on the day.  Anu
@MaxMerrill_ Thanks for tagging us. We’d like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and name. One of our Social Media team will be with you shortly. Thanks – Jerry

data.text: @jamesjfox Hi James, we'd like to look into this for you. Could you please DM us your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Maria
@david13550964 Hi David, I've responded to your DM. Please check. - Yen
@rindrahillary Hi there - so we can check this further for you, can you please send us a direct message with your  booking reference. Thanks - Marli

@saroindn Thanks for confirming Palanisamy. I've cancelled your booking and requested the refund of SGD $400 for your entire trip. Please allow 7 business days for it to be processed to the credit card used. Thanks - Cy
@saroindn Hi Saro, I have responded to your DM. - Lindsay
@peaceloveblink Hi there, we have a special policy in place for some affected flights. If you could send us your booking reference and full name via DM, I could check yours. Thanks -Kelly
@kathykats24 Hi Kate, I've responded to your tweet. Thanks - Maria

@dazblaze Hi Darren, for your own security, we ask that you delete your tweet as it contains your booking details and this is not something we advise to be posted publicly. Kindly send us a DM so we can assist. Thanks - Lindsay
@timwhite90 Hi Tim, We'd like to assist with your visa requirement. Please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can take a look at this for you. Thanks - Joie

@dazblaze Hi Darren, I recognise that your girlfriend was not able to board her flight. We'd like to check this further for you. Kindly send us a DM along with her booking reference and full name. Thanks - Yen
@thelia28 Thanks for your reply. We’d like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and name. One of our Social Media team will be with you shortly. Thanks – Jerry

@kyueqy Thanks for your tweet, Erna. I recognise that the flights are not suitable for you and I apologise. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name so we can see how we can assist? Thanks - Lee
@boogeyyy Hi there, please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Maria

data.text: @indrawankurnia Hi Indrawan, thanks for your tweet. I'd like to check about your refund request. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Jayme
@MinoSingh Hi Mino, thanks for the Tweet. A tripod isn't permitted in your carry-on however, you can bring it in your checked baggage instead if needed. Hope that helped! - Cy
@ajlegaspi Hi AJ, I'm glad to hear that our staff was able to assist with your booking. I'll make sure to pass this to the relevant team as I'm sure Maddi would appreciate this. Thanks - Joie

data.text: @novia_amel Hi Novia, thanks for the tweet. So we can look into your refund request for your flight to Singapore, could you please send us a DM of your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Cy
@4Twist4 Hi Lex, I understand the concert you were to attend to got cancelled. If you could send us a DM, along with your booking reference and full name, so we can check this? Thanks - Mariz
@bhawanhira2010 Please be assured we are in constant contact with the relevant health authorities and we'll notify you of any changes to our operations. Thanks – Camille 2/2

@bhawanhira2010 Hi Bhawan, I can appreciate that this must be stressful for you. However, as advised, flights between Indonesia and Singapore have not been impacted, as such, all flights will operate as scheduled. 1/2
@chisinRPL 2/2 Please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can see how we can help you. Thanks - Lee

@chisinRPL 1/2 Thanks for your tweet, Ban. We pride ourselves in maintaining the highest quality of customer service standards for our passengers, and I'm so sorry that your recent experience with us on your flight from Singapore fell short of expectations.
@Kiki30920042 Thanks for replying, Kiki. Please note that I have already replied to your DM. - Josh

@Kiki30920042 Hi Kiki, thanks for your tweet. Could you send your booking reference and full name via DM so we can check the status of your flight to Singapore. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks - Lee

@bhawanhira2010 I hope you can understand that due to privacy purposes we're unable to discuss your booking on a public platform, as such it's best to send us a DM and we'll be glad to have a look into this. Thanks - Mariz

@bhawanhira2010 I understand that you're worried about travelling at this time. Please know that we do review all requests however, this will be on a case by case basis. So we can discuss this further, please do send us a DM. Thanks - Mariz

data.text: @bhawanhira2010 Thanks for your reply. I hope you may appreciate that we're unable to discuss your booking on a public platform for your privacy. You can DM us so we can discuss this further. Again, please delete your tweet that contains your booking reference. Thanks - Jerry
@jjjejessica Hi Jessica, thanks for your tweet. I'd be glad to check if you can cancel your flight. Could you DM me your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Jayme

@maharabensis Hi Mriae, thanks for tweet. I recognise that you'd missed your flight with us. We’d like to have a look into this for you. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name along with more info? Thanks - Jayme

@valenciaalen_ Hi Valencia, all of our customers are given 7kg of carry-on baggage – including handbags and laptops. It’s less
about making profit, and more about being able to keep the costs of our airfares down. Thanks - Yen
